verbs.description: [V: sizzling] tex - [ARG1: mex fajitas] my family likes garlic so i dreamed up this delicious marinade for our summer fajita dinners the marinade needs eight hours to work its magic but it even better if the steak marinates overnight try it on chicken breasts too —karyn
